channel.title: MA35D1 on 暐宗's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in MA35D1 on 暐宗's Blog

item.title: MA35D1 extra package in Yocto project after the image is built
item.description: Open local.conf nuvoton@84d536ecc45d:~/shared/yocto/build$ vim conf/local.conf For example : add pip3 and devmem2 CORE_IMAGE_EXTRA_INSTALL += “devmem2”

item.title: MA35D1 devmem2 Read / Write memory address
item.description: devmem2 Tool read register devmem2 0x40600014 TRM SPI Status Register (SPIx_STATUS) write 32bit to register devmem2 0x40600014 w 0x0058112

item.title: MA35D1 開機啟動位置
item.description: MA35D1 QT startup path vi /etc/profile.d/qt5-env.sh You can write that you want to auto execute command or script here.

item.title: MA35D1 IoT 的 SPI 介面使用
item.description: MA35D1 SPI Device Tree 路徑 : ~/yocto/build/tmp-glibc/work-shared/numaker-iot-ma35d16f90/kernel-source/arch/arm64/boot/dts/nuvoton/ma35d1.dtsi spi0: spi@40600000 { compatible = "nuvoton,ma35d1-spi"; reg = <0x0 0x40600000 0x0 0x10000>; interrupts = <GIC_SPI 89 IRQ_TYPE_LEVEL_HIGH>; clocks = <&clk SPI0_GATE>; dmas = <&pdma1 4>,<&pdma1 5>; dma-names = "tx","rx"; pdma_reqsel_tx = <60>; pdma_reqsel_rx = <61>; use_pdma = <0>; num_cs = <2>; lsb = <0>; sleep = <0>; txbitlen = <8>; bus_num = <2>; spimode = <0>; mrxphase = <0>; spi-max-frequency = <10000000>; status = "disabled"; }; 路徑 : ~/yocto/build/tmp-glibc/work-shared/numaker-iot-ma35d16f90/kernel-source/arch/arm64/boot/dts/nuvoton/ma35d1-iot-512m.

item.title: 解決 MA35D1 M4 SRAM 128KB 不夠，調用A35 DDR space 384KB 的方法
item.description: 跟新唐過去Cortex® M4 的 Feature 不一樣的地方 M4 speed 調升至 180 MHz 本章的重點，SRAM 有 128KB 以及 可以控制DDR 384KB Support Peripheral 1.

item.title: MA35D1 M4 使用設定
item.description: Description Enable the Remoteproc device driver in the Linux kernel.

item.title: MA35D1 Yocto 安裝說明
item.description: MA35D16A887C (BGA312) MCP package with DDR3L (256 MB) 7-inch TFT LCD (1024x600) with touch daughter board
